title: Posey Holder, mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: Five solid panels 9with engraved design) for handle; five open-work panels, each showing a simple upright flower, for bouquet. Chain with ring for finger.

tombstone.epitaph:
Posey Holder, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Silver. Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes. 1946-50-63.
